sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom" const SessionDashboard = () => { const history = useHistory(); const { standId } = useParams(); const [currentStand, setCurrentStand] = useState({}); const [stands, setStands] = useState([]); const [isDeleted, setIsDeleted] = useState(false); const goToTransaction = () => { history.push("/transaction-page"); }; const goToCloseout = () => { history.push("/closeout"); } useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/stands/${standId}`) .then((res)=>setCurrentStand(res.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/stands') .then((res) => { setStands(res.data); setIsDeleted(false)}) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) }, [isDeleted]) const handleDelete = (deleteStandId) => { axios.delete('http://localhost:800/api/stands/'+deleteStandId) .then((res)=>{setIsDeleted(true)}) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } return (

Today's Totals

Cups sold: {currentStand.total_cups}

Total Recipts: ${currentStand.total_sales}

Tips: ${currentStand.total_tips}

Costs Incurred: ${currentStand.total_costs_incurred}

Profit (not including tips): ${currentStand.total_sales - currentStand.total_tips - currentStand.total_costs_incurred}

Supplies on Hand

Cups: 15

Lemon Slices: 12

Sugar Scoops: 30

Last 5 Sales

Time Sale Amount
11:32 AM $18
10:06 AM $8
10:06 AM $8
9:45 AM $4
9:30 AM $12
{stands.map((stand, idx) => { return (

{stand.is_open}

) })}
) } export default SessionDashboard
